item.description:
The Holiday season is here, and Chanukah is just around the corner, so let's mark our calendars and plan to celebrate the Mosaic way.  The festive, fun-filled evening will include things like a “Sufganiyot (jelly donut) on a String” contest, Jewish history trivia challenge, and an optional "Matone Osbayt" (gift exchange), for humorous ones of $10 this year. 

We'll gamble with a dreidel, and perhaps even sing a few traditional holiday songs. The menu will include latkes with all the fixings, vegetables and dip, maybe even some kosher chicken wings, and knishes along with kugel and other treats.

RSVP: Mandatory by Tuesday December 13th so that the ordering can be completed.  You can pay via paypal at the Mosaic website: mosaicofma.org or bring a payment with you.  

MEET: 4pm - 7pm Party is at a private home in Newton; location and directions will be sent to registered attendees.

COST: $8 for the party and $5 for Meetup members ($ 13) both will be waived for anyone who become a full member of Mosaic of MA that evening ($25 for 12 months) - we'll have membership forms available.
item.how_to_find_us: Party is at a Private Home in Newton and location and directions will be sent to registered attendees.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Celebrate Chanukah
